description.lang: In-Wall Smart Toggle Switch (120/277VAC) with QuickFit and SimpleWire enhancements. Revolutionary QuickFit design features a housing depth that is up to 20 percent smaller than the previous Z-Wave models. This reduced size coupled with the elimination of heat taps provides a better fit in older style boxes and multi-gang configurations. SimpleWire technology allows line and load to automatically be configured with auto-sensing line-load terminals. All of this is coupled with Z-Wave S2 and Smart Start allows for effortless installation while being safer than ever!
Supports Basic Set and is controlled by pressing the ON or OFF button with the local load.
Supports Basic Set and is controlled by double pressing the ON or OFF button.
Default - normal exclusionActive - perform a series of button presses to help eliminate accidental exclusion
Press any button on the switch
Press two times ON button and two time OFF button, LED will flash 5 times if successful
Configure LED indication to default, invert, always off or always on
LED ON when device is OFF, LED is OFF when device is ON
LED ON when device is ON, LED is OFF when device is OFF
